recipesJson.name: Monkey Suite
recipesJson.author: RuntDastardly
recipesJson.description:
A rich, decadent, banana custard tart. Not a shake-n-vape, needs at least a 4-week steep for the custards to develop properly, but thoroughly worth the wait.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nzUY6Iiur6E

reviews.text: A delicious blend of custard and banana will definitely make this again thanks
